021import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
024import net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder;
025import net.tnemc.menu.core.callbacks.page.PageOpenCallback;
026import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.DataAction;
027import net.tnemc.menu.core.icon.action.impl.SwitchPageAction;
028import net.tnemc.menu.core.viewer.MenuViewer;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageHandler;
032
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.UUID;
036
037/**
038 * CurrencySelectionPage
039 *
040 * @author creatorfromhell
041 * @since 0.1.3.0
042 */
043public class CurrencySelectionPage {
044
045  protected final String returnMenu;
046  protected final String menuName;
047  protected final int menuPage;
048  protected final int returnPage;
049  protected final String currencyID;
050  protected final String currencyPageID;
051  protected final int menuRows;
052
053  public CurrencySelectionPage(final String currencyID, final String returnMenu, final String menuName,
054                               final int menuPage, final int returnPage, final String currencyPageID, final int menuRows) {
055
056    this.returnMenu = returnMenu;
057    this.menuName = menuName;
058    this.menuPage = menuPage;
059    this.returnPage = returnPage;
060    this.currencyID = currencyID;
061    this.currencyPageID = currencyPageID;
062
063    //we need a controller row and then at least one row for items.
064    this.menuRows = (menuRows <= 1)? 2 : menuRows;
065  }
066
067  public void handle(final PageOpenCallback callback) {
068
069
070    final Optional<MenuViewer> viewer = callback.getPlayer().viewer();
071    if(viewer.isPresent()) {
072
073      final UUID id = viewer.get().uuid();
074      final int page = (Integer)viewer.get().dataOrDefault(currencyPageID, 1);
075      final int items = (menuRows - 1) * 9;
076      final int start = ((page - 1) * items);
077
078      final int maxPages = (TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().size() / items) + (((TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().size() % items) > 0)? 1 : 0);
079
080      final int prev = (page <= 1)? maxPages : page - 1;
081      final int next = (page >= maxPages)? 1 : page + 1;
082
083      if(maxPages > 1) {
084
085        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("RED_WOOL", 1)
086                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPageDisplay"), id))
087                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.PreviousPage"), id))))
088                                           .withActions(new DataAction(currencyPageID, prev), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
089                                           .withSlot(0)
090                                           .build());
091
092        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("GREEN_WOOL", 1)
093                                                           .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPageDisplay"), id))
094                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.NextPage"), id))))
095                                           .withActions(new DataAction(currencyPageID, next), new SwitchPageAction(menuName, menuPage))
096                                           .withSlot(8)
097                                           .build());
098      }
099
100      callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of("BARRIER", 1)
101                                                         .customName(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.EscapeDisplay"), id))
102                                                         .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.Shared.Escape"), id))))
103                                         .withActions(new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
104                                         .withSlot(4)
105                                         .build());
106
107      for(int i = start; i < start + items; i++) {
108        if(TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().size() <= i) {
109          break;
110        }
111
112        final Currency currency = TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().get(i);
113
114        callback.getPage().addIcon(new IconBuilder(PluginCore.server().stackBuilder().of(currency.getIconMaterial(), 1)
115                                                           .customName(Component.text(currency.getIdentifier()))
116                                                           .lore(Collections.singletonList(MessageHandler.grab(new MessageData("Messages.Menu.MyBal.Currency.Select"), id))))
117                                           .withActions(new DataAction(currencyID, currency.getUid()),
118                                                        new SwitchPageAction(returnMenu, returnPage))
119                                           .withSlot(9 + (i - start))
120                                           .build());
121      }
122    }
123  }
124}
